org.apache.ignite.ml.optimization

Interface SmoothParametrized<M extends Parametrized<M>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Function<Matrix,Matrix>, IgniteFunction<Matrix,Matrix>, Model<Matrix,Matrix>, Parametrized<M>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultilayerPerceptron

    public interface SmoothParametrized<M extends Parametrized<M>>
extends Parametrized<M>, Model<Matrix,Matrix>
    Interface for models which are smooth functions of their parameters.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • differentiateByParameters

        Vector differentiateByParameters(IgniteFunction<Vector,IgniteDifferentiableVectorToDoubleFunction> loss,
                                 Matrix inputsBatch,
                                 Matrix truthBatch)
        Compose function in the following way: feed output of this model as input to second argument to loss function. After that we have a function g of three arguments: input, ground truth, parameters. If we consider function h(w) = 1 / M sum_{i=1}^{M} g(w, input_i, groundTruth_i), where M is number of entries in batch, we get function of one argument: parameters vector w. This function is being differentiated.
        Parameters:
        loss - Loss function.
        inputsBatch - Batch of inputs.
        truthBatch - Batch of ground truths.
        Returns:
        Gradient of h at current point in parameters space.

      • parameters

        Vector parameters()
        Get parameters vector.
        Returns:
        Parameters vector.

      • setParameters

        M setParameters(Vector vector)
        Set parameters.
        Parameters:

      • parametersCount

        Get count of parameters of this model.
        Returns:
